articles.description: When it comes to a team sport, it's hard for an individual player to impact the outcome of a wager.
articles.content:
When it comes to a team sport, its hard for an individual player to impact the outcome of a wager. When the wager relates directly to the individual player, it becomes a lot easier.
Thats the realit… [+2077 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Tucker
articles.title: Dan Hurley’s not afraid. But are he and UConn too confident this March Madness? - The Athletic
articles.description: Hurley and UConn have been strutting through the NCAA Tournament, but they don't think they're overdoing the big talk.
articles.content: BOSTON Dan Hurley knows this is not how coaches talk. Certainly not coaches of teams already wearing a bullseye as the reigning national champion and current No. 1 overall seed in the NCAA Tournament… [+4483 chars]
